name: AutoManga Cel Animation Engine
short_description: AutoManga will provide authoring tools (integrated with the Skencil vector graphics program) and PyGame (SDL) based display tools for parametric character animation, with tools and helpers optimized for "manga-style" characters. Uses 2D SVG "cels".
